>Do you have feedback, your own experience with encryption on Raspberry?

Yes. BerryBoot with built in LUKS. Simplest way to do full disk encryption, click "Yes" when asked if you want to do disk encryption and enter your password. Done. VC containers in NTFS format also messes with Linux permissions, which doesn't fly with my Cloud running on the Pi.
